title: Create Spanish (es) UI translation pack

requirements.text: Create a complete Spanish (es) translation pack for the UI by replacing the current `es: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit Spanish dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` (i.e., provide Spanish values for all keys currently present in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons where they exist). Do not change other languages in this step.

quotes: Önce sadece ispayolca çeviri dosyasını oluştur.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` contains an `es` entry with Spanish translations (not a reference to `commonTranslations`).
All keys defined in `commonTranslations` have corresponding Spanish values in the `es` translation entry (no missing keys).
When selecting “Español” from the in-app language selector, key UI labels (e.g., Home, Welcome, Back, Loading, Game Zone, Quiz Zone, Coloring Section) display in Spanish instead of English.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep scope limited to Spanish (es) translations only; do not add/update other languages in this change.
nonGoals: Adding translation packs for other languages (tr/en/de/fr/it/ru/pt/zh/hi/etc.).
Changing backend language enums or backend localization behavior.
Refactoring the i18n system (e.g., splitting translations into multiple modules) beyond what is necessary to add the Spanish pack.
